org.opends.server.admin.client.cli

Class SecureConnectionCliParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.forgerock.opendj.cli.ArgumentParser
      • com.forgerock.opendj.cli.SubCommandArgumentParser
        • org.opends.server.admin.client.cli.SecureConnectionCliParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.forgerock.opendj.cli.ToolRefDocContainer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReplicationCliArgumentParser, StatusCliArgumentParser, UninstallerArgumentParser

    public abstract class SecureConnectionCliParser
extends com.forgerock.opendj.cli.SubCommandArgumentParser
    This is a commodity class that can be used to check the arguments required to establish a secure connection in the command line. It can be used to generate an ApplicationTrustManager object based on the options provided by the user in the command line.

        Parameters:
        mainClassName - The fully-qualified name of the Java class that should be invoked to launch the program with which this argument parser is associated.
        toolDescription - A human-readable description for the tool, which will be included when displaying usage information.
        longArgumentsCaseSensitive - Indicates whether subcommand and long argument names should be treated in a case-sensitive manner.

      • getBindPassword

        public String getBindPassword()
        Gets the password which has to be used for the command without prompting the user. If no password was specified, return null.
        Returns:
        The password stored into the specified file on by the command line argument, or null it if not specified.

      • createGlobalArguments

        protected Set<com.forgerock.opendj.cli.Argument> createGlobalArguments(OutputStream outStream,
                                                                       boolean alwaysSSL)
                                                                throws com.forgerock.opendj.cli.ArgumentException
        Initialize Global option.
        Parameters:
        outStream - The output stream used for the usage.
        alwaysSSL - If true, always use the SSL connection type. In this case, the arguments useSSL and startTLS are not present.
        Returns:
        a ArrayList with the options created.
        Throws:
        com.forgerock.opendj.cli.ArgumentException - If there is a problem with any of the parameters used to create this argument.

      • getConnectTimeout

        public int getConnectTimeout()
                      throws IllegalStateException
        Returns the timeout to be used to connect in milliseconds. The method must be called after parsing the arguments.
        Returns:
        the timeout to be used to connect in milliseconds or 0 if there is no timeout.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the method is called before parsing the arguments.
